fullText: Joshua Harmon's ambitious family epic spans decades of Jewish experience in France, building to a powerful exploration of antisemitism and belonging that feels urgently relevant.
dtliExcerpt: Joshua Harmon's ambitious family epic spans decades of Jewish experience in France, building to a powerful exploration of antisemitism and belonging that feels urgently relevant.
